titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of February 12, 2015, as "Darwin Day" and recognizing the importance of science in the betterment of humanity.
A resolution expressing support for the designation of February 12, 2015, as "Darwin Day" and recognizing the importance of science in the betterment of humanity.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of Darwin Day (February 12, 2015, the anniversary of the birth of Charles Darwin in 1809).
Recognizes Charles Darwin as a worthy symbol on which to celebrate the achievements of reason, science, and the advancement of human knowledge.
